about_the_game:
Unlock all romance options and storylines in Date Z with this Ultimate Pack! Deepen relationships with Alicia, Bao, and Vivica at Massville High, each offering unique challenges and paths. Face unpredictable personalities that push your choices to the limit. Expand your story, boost survival chances, and uncover a special hidden secret in this emotional rollercoaster.

This DLC gives you:

• All three new romanceable characters unlocked, plus one hidden romance option

• Additional storylines with unique dialogue options

• Completely new game endings for each character

• Two special hidden endings

• Exclusive visuals featuring your new romance options and new events
